summary: an enchantment that conjures arrows as you need them
descriptionHtml:
just to inform anyone who would still come across this I will no longer work on mods for skyrim original version see for my mods in the skyrim special edition category instead :3

[color=#ff0000]No longer maintained beta version[/color]

~ the enchantment cannot detect if you have arrows equipped already or not so you will always get arrows ~

[color=#BF00FF]Information[/color] as much as I liked doing mods for skyrim I lost all my self made scripts some time ago so there will most likely be no update for this mod or other mods I have made sorry for the inconvenience I hope some of you still enjoy it somewhat :3

[color=#00ff00]Update[/color] V 0.3 Beta
if you don't have arrows and you equip the bow or the enchantment (you need both but the order doesn't matter anymore) you will get some.

[color=#009900]Update[/color] V 0.2.1 Beta
obsolete

[color=#007700]Update[/color] V 0.2 Beta
on equipping the enchanted gloves and using the bow with no arrows equipped should give you arrows now

adds an enchantment that can be used on gloves or jewelry~

[color=#ff0000]Beta notification:[/color]
as of the beta the only way to currently get the gloves is through the console!
a short and simple instruction to get the gloves with the console for those who don't know
#1 open the console ~
#2 type help "Mystic Gauntlets of Conjuration"
#3 type player.additem <itemID> <count>

when wearing something with this enchantment and you shoot your bow
your last arrow used will be conjured so you can't run out of arrows
as long as you have [b]at least 2 arrows[/b] ! (as of beta 0.1)

FAQ
Q: Does this work with crossbows ?
A: No. at least not yet
author: beagle547
